name: Button Builder 2.0 with Auto-Layout 3.0
description:
2250 fully customizable button variants to create any button type you need.


How To Use

You can use the buttons as is, but if you'd like to modify the colors or size options, here are the steps:


  1. Text-styles hold both text-styles and sizes used in the buttons. Adjust the heights and color of the text-styles in the _button-text variant component.
  2. To change the variant background colors, select the whole variant component and use Selection Colors to modify the colors in bulk.


Content positions should automatically adjust depending on the type of content-orientation you select. Note that the buttons do not automatically adjust width due to the constraints needed to orient the content properly.


Feel free to reach out if you have any questions on twitter @DimitriOtero!
